response.explain: The previous action was successful and the robot has moved to the countertop. The next step is to take the butter from the plate on the countertop.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(4) Move to the countertop
(5) Take the butter from the plate on the countertop
(6) Move to the stove
(7) Cook the prawn
(8) Move to the plate
(9) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(10) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Take the butter from the plate on the countertop
    butter = registry(env,"butter_208")
    EasyGrasp(robot, butter)
    donothing(env)
